topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5427686363687277d55a0000#post_5427686363687277d55a0000
There are four options.

The original Ultraman. (Can't go wrong with the classics) Ultraseven. (If you want something more mature) Ultraman Tiga. (If you want something more recent that has nothing to do with past installments) Or Ultraman Moebius. (If you want something more recent that has everything to do with past installments)
